properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 12:33PM EST until January 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 8 ft expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
